musicmemorygame

Class AudioPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • musicmemorygame.AudioPlayer

  • public class AudioPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    The AudioPlayer class is responsible for anything involved with the audio files. Responsibilities include: playing the song for the right amount of time, playing the song at the right starting point, selecting the next song, and giving song information.
